In the Interests of Full Disclosure...
Thanks

In the Interests of Full Disclosure...

I admit that I did evaluate the mapping toolbox from Mathworks under a trial license. However, other than putting all the outputs into structure arrays (an idea I think I would have arrived at on my own anyway), nothing changed hands here. In fact I looked at no code at all (I only evaluated the OUTPUT). If you don't believe me, just look at the C code for the mex file. I defy anyone at Mathworks to write code as sloppy as that.
